bioconda.name: bioconductor-mmdiff2
bioconda.summary: Statistical Testing for ChIP-Seq data sets

biotools.summary: This package detects statistically significant differences between read enrichment profiles in different ChIP-Seq samples. To take advantage of shape differences it uses Kernel methods (Maximum Mean Discrepancy, MMD).

bioschemas.name: MMDiff2
bioschemas.summary: This package detects statistically significant differences between read enrichment profiles in different ChIP-Seq samples. To take advantage of shape differences it uses Kernel methods (Maximum Mean Discrepancy, MMD).
